name: Madni Signature Bridal Set
description: A heavy 24k gold bridal masterpiece featuring intricate filigree work, complete with a choker, long mala, earrings, and tikka. The signature look of Madni Jewellers.

name: Traditional Gold Rani Haar
description: An exquisite long Rani Haar crafted in pure gold with red and green meenakari accents. A timeless heirloom piece.

name: Gujrati Polki Jhumkas
description: Classic heavy gold jhumkas embellished with uncut polki diamonds and pearl drops. Traditional craftsmanship from Gujrat.

name: Antique Mala Set
description: A stunning antique-finish gold mala paired with matching tops. Elegant and sophisticated for formal gatherings.

name: Turkish Gold Ring
description: Modern 21k Turkish gold ring with a laser-cut mesh design. Lightweight yet impactful.

name: Solid Gold Bangles (Kangan)
description: Pair of heavy solid gold Kangans with screw opening mechanism and embossed floral patterns.

name: Emerald & Gold Choker
description: A fitted gold choker set embedded with real emerald stones, perfect for Walima brides.

name: Locket Set (Lightweight)
description: A delicate gold chain and locket set with matching small tops. Ideal for daily wear or gifting.

name: Men's Gold Signet Ring
description: Classic square-top gold ring for men with a black onyx stone center.

name: Diamond Solitaire Ring
description: Certified diamond solitaire set in 18k white gold. Simple, modern, and elegant.

name: Matha Patti & Tikka Set
description: Full coverage gold headpiece (Matha Patti) with intricate detailing for the perfect bridal look.

name: Italian Gold Bracelet
description: Sleek and stylish Italian 21k gold bracelet with a high-polish finish.
